title: RANKED PLACEMENTS
body: I  would like to know why rank placements don't mean anything for your final rank placement. My friend won 7 out of 10 games and A's and S's all games but still got into bronze 5 I really don't understand why this would happen after all of that effort in placement games when he was a higher rank last season. Please fix this cause its a problem which is ruining the game who wants to be put into b5 after all this and have to climb back out of it again?????....

replies.body: But there's a promo helper now, they made it easier to climb out if you're good enough to get in promos easy.

Well I don't know whats up, or what starting elo your friend was in and all that.
But I had a friend who was Gold 4, Won 9 games.
He got put into Silver 2.

That person was Me.
I had won 7 out of 10 placements and got put into Bronze 5 when I was higher last season...  
and I my mates that had won less have been placed higher than me... it's kinda ridiculous... and makes it look like placements are a total waste of time and don't mean a thing...
Your first 5 games matter more than the last 5. If you won all 5 first games, then there's a problem, otherwise everything is meant to be.
So basically your mmr is appalling and you're wondering why you weren't place higher. Just out of curiosity though, were your losses at the start or end of your placements?

Let me guess. you were Bronze 3 or 4 last season?

I was Silver 2, went 7-3, got placed in Silver 4. It happens.
Another words placements are a total waste of time.. and do not mean a thing in this game...

i was silver 3 went 7-3 got bronze 3
a whole division
a friend silver 1 won 7-3 got silver 3
Its based on your MMR. Rito is also encourages climbing so you get put a bit lower than you should be. Still, they made it alot easier.
was gold 2 on my smurf, won 6/10 and got placed in gold 1 lol. Too scared to play my main hahaha
